newsitem.title: USA: Chartwell Re extends consent deadline.
newsitem.headline: Chartwell Re extends consent deadline.

text.p: Chartwell Re Holdings Corp said Thursday it has extended the deadline for holders of its 10.25 percent Senior Notes Due 2004 to submit their consents on proposed amendments to the notes' covenants to 1700 EDT/2100 GMT May 28 from May 14.

The company said it is seeking the consent of a majority of holders of the $48.75 million principal notes outstanding. The deadline was extended to allow holders who received delayed notification time to consider the proposal.
Spokeswoman Nancy Saltzman did not have a compilation of consents to date, but noted the total is "clearly not a majority."
Chartwell Re Holdings is a subsidiary of Chartwell Re Corp. ((-- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.))
